title: Member Welfare Services / सदस्य कल्याण सेवाहरू
description: Various welfare services provided to our members / हाम्रा सदस्यहरूलाई प्रदान गरिने विभिन्न कल्याणकारी सेवाहरू

welfareServices.title: Health Insurance / स्वास्थ्य बीमा
welfareServices.description: Comprehensive health insurance coverage for members and their families / सदस्यहरू र तिनका परिवारका लागि व्यापक स्वास्थ्य बीमा

welfareServices.title: Educational Support / शैक्षिक सहयोग
welfareServices.description: Educational scholarships and support for members' children / सदस्यका छोराछोरीहरूका लागि शैक्षिक छात्रवृत्ति र सहयोग

welfareServices.title: Emergency Fund / आपतकालीन कोष
welfareServices.description: Emergency financial assistance during crisis / संकटको समयमा आपतकालीन आर्थिक सहायता
